results.title: Sony WH-1000XM5 Wireless Industry Leading Noise Canceling Headphones | Black
results.description:
YOUR WORLD. NOTHING ELSE.


The WH-1000XM5 headphones redefine the standards for uninterrupted listening experiences. Harnessing the power of 2 processors overseeing 8 microphones, they deliver unparalleled noise cancellation and remarkable call clarity. Featuring a newly developed driver and supported by DSEE-Extreme and Hi-Res audio technology, these headphones offer breathtaking audio quality.





Quick Access
Sony's Quick Access feature puts your favorite songs or soundscapes from Spotify, Amazon Music, and Endel just 2-3 taps away, all without needing your phone.







Industry-leading noise cancellation
Our WH-1000XM5 wireless headphones feature 8 microphones for noise cancellation, effectively blocking out a wider range of sounds, from airplane noise to people's voices. With the new Auto NC Optimizer, noise canceling adjusts automatically to your wearing conditions and environment, ensuring optimal performance.





Incomparable noise processing
Crafted by Sony, the Integrated Processor V1 unleashes the complete capabilities of our HD Noise Canceling Processor QN1. This distinctive fusion of technology harnesses control over 8 microphones, ensuring unparalleled noise canceling quality.







Magnificent sound, engineered to perfection
The light and rigid precision-engineered driver unit improves high frequency sensitivity for more natural sound quality. Sony unique technologies include a premium lead-free solder containing gold for excellent conductivity, Fine Sound Resistor for even power distribution, and optimized circuitry for an improved signal-to-noise ratio to ensure clear, consistent sound.





Crystal Clear hands-free calling
Utilizing Precise Voice Pickup Technology and advanced audio signal processing, your voice remains crystal clear to the recipient, even amidst noisy environments. Our noise reduction algorithm, developed with AI machine learning from over 500 million voice samples, adeptly suppresses ambient noise, ensuring your voice is extracted clearly across various settings.







Speak-to-Chat
Upon initiating a conversation, Speak-to-Chat promptly pauses your music, allowing ambient sounds to filter through—perfect for hands-free discussions while keeping your headphones on. This intelligent functionality leverages built-in headphone microphones and sophisticated audio signal processing to detect and respond to your voice. Once your conversation concludes, your music resumes playback seamlessly.
